title: JavaScript Level 9 â€” Array Algorithms & Filtering Data
intro: This level applies arrays to real tasks like filtering, counting and processing data.
points: Loop through arrays to filter elements based on conditions.
Build new arrays by selecting certain elements.
Count how many elements match a condition (like even numbers).
Understand basic search patterns: find an element in an array.
Prepare for using higher-order methods like map, filter and reduce later.
